StringReg.Name: DeviceVendorName
StringReg.ToolTip: Indicates the name of the device's vendor
StringReg.Description: This is a read only element. It is a text description that indicates the name of the device's vendor.

StringReg.Name: DeviceModelName
StringReg.ToolTip: Indicates the model name of the device
StringReg.Description: This is a read only element. It is a text description that indicates the model name of the device.

StringReg.Name: DeviceVersion
StringReg.ToolTip: Indicates the version of the device
StringReg.Description: This is a read only element. It is a string that indicates the version of the device.

StringReg.Name: DeviceManufacturerInfo
StringReg.ToolTip: Provides additional information from the vendor about the device
StringReg.Description: This is a read only element. It is a string that provides additional information from the vendor about the camera.

StringReg.Name: DeviceSerialNumber
StringReg.ToolTip: Indicates the version of the device
StringReg.Description: This is a read only element. It is a string that indicates the version of the device.

StringReg.Name: DeviceUserID
StringReg.Description: Device`s user ID. This string is a unique identifier of the device.

Integer.Name: Width
Integer.ToolTip: Width of the image provided by the device (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Width of the image provided by the device (in pixels).

IntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_Width
IntReg.Description: Width of the image provided by the device (in pixels).

Integer.Name: Height
Integer.ToolTip: Height of the image provided by the device (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Height of the image provided by the device (in pixels).

IntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_Height
IntReg.Description: Height of the image provided by the device (in pixels).

Integer.Name: OffsetX
Integer.ToolTip: Horizontal offset from the origin to the region of interest (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Horizontal offset from the origin to the region of interest (in pixels).

IntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_OffsetX
IntReg.Description: Horizontal offset from the origin to the region of interest (in pixels).

Integer.Name: OffsetY
Integer.ToolTip: Vertical offset from the origin to the region of interest (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Vertical offset from the origin to the region of interest (in pixels).

IntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_OffsetY
IntReg.Description: Vertical offset from the origin to the region of interest (in pixels).

Enumeration.Name: PixelFormat
Enumeration.ToolTip: Format of the pixels provided by the device.
Enumeration.Description: Format of the pixels provided by the device. It represents all the information provided by PixelCoding, PixelSize, PixelColorFilter combined in a single feature.

Integer.Name: SensorWidth
Integer.ToolTip: Effective width of the sensor in pixels.
Integer.Description: Effective width of the sensor in pixels.

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_SensorWidth
MaskedIntReg.Description: Effective width of the sensor in pixels.

Integer.Name: SensorHeight
Integer.ToolTip: Effective height of the sensor in pixels.
Integer.Description: Effective height of the sensor in pixels.

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_SensorHeight
MaskedIntReg.Description: Height of the image provided by the device (in pixels).

Integer.Name: BinningHorizontal
Integer.ToolTip: This feature represents the number of horizontal photo-sensitive cells.
Integer.Description: This feature represents the number of horizontal photo-sensitive cells.

Integer.Name: BinningVertical
Integer.ToolTip: This feature represents the number of vertical photo-sensitive cells.
Integer.Description: This feature represents the number of vertical photo-sensitive cells. This feature is not available in PoE mode.

Enumeration.Name: TestImageSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature selects the type of test image that is sent by the camera.
Enumeration.Description: This feature selects the type of test image that is sent by the camera.

Enumeration.Name: AcquisitionMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the acquisition mode of the device.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the acquisition mode of the device. It defines mainly the number of frames to capture during an acquisition and the way the acquisition stops.

EnumEntry.Name: MultiFrame
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The number of frames specified by AcquisitionFrameCount is captured.
EnumEntry.Description: The number of frames specified by AcquisitionFrameCount is captured.

EnumEntry.Name: Continuous
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Frames are captured continuously until stopped with the AcquisitionStop command.
EnumEntry.Description: Frames are captured continuously until stopped with the AcquisitionStop command.

Command.Name: AcquisitionStart
Command.ToolTip: Starts the Acquisition of the device.
Command.Description: Starts the Acquisition of the device. The number of frames captured is specified by AcquisitionMode.

Command.Name: AcquisitionStop
Command.ToolTip: Stops the Acquisition of the device at the end of the current Frame.
Command.Description: Stops the Acquisition of the device at the end of the current Frame. It is mainly used when AcquisitionMode is Continuous but can be used in any acquisition mode.

Integer.Name: AcquisitionFrameCount
Integer.ToolTip: Number of frames to acquire in MultiFrame Acquisition mode.
Integer.Description: Number of frames to acquire in MultiFrame Acquisition mode. The Max value of AcquisitionFrameCount is affected by Width, Height, and PixelFormat when the MemoryShotMode is On.

Enumeration.Name: AcquisitionFrameRateAuto
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature automatically controls the maximum rate (in Hertz) at which the Line in Frame are captured when TriggerMode is Off.
Enumeration.Description: This feature automatically controls the maximum rate (in Hertz) at which the Line in Frame are captured when TriggerMode is Off.

Float.Name: AcquisitionFrameRate
Float.ToolTip: This feature controls the rate (in Hertz) at which the Line in Frame are captured when TriggerMode is Off for the Frame Trigger.
Float.Description: This feature controls the rate (in Hertz) at which the Line in Frame are captured when TriggerMode is Off for the Frame Trigger.

Float.Name: AcquisitionFrameRateActual
Float.ToolTip: This feature indicates the actual frame rate (in Hertz).
Float.Description: This feature indicates the actual frame rate (in Hertz).

Enumeration.Name: ExposureMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature is used to set the operation mode of the Exposure (or shutter).
Enumeration.Description: This feature is used to set the operation mode of the Exposure (or shutter).

Float.Name: ExposureTime
Float.ToolTip: This feature used to set the Exposure time (in us) when ExposureMode is Timed.
Float.Description: This feature used to set the Exposure time (in us) when ExposureMode is Timed.

Integer.Name: ExposureTimeRaw
Integer.ToolTip: This feature used to set the Exposure time (in us) when ExposureMode is Timed.
Integer.Description: This feature used to set the Exposure time (in us) when ExposureMode is Timed.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: TriggerMode define if the selected trigger is active.
Enumeration.Description: TriggerMode define if the selected trigger is active.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: TriggerSource specifies the internal signal or physical input Line to use as the trigger source for the selected trigger when TriggerMode is On.
Enumeration.Description: TriggerSource specifies the internal signal or physical input Line to use as the trigger source for the selected trigger when TriggerMode is On.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerInhibit
Enumeration.ToolTip: TriggerInhibit specifies the activation of the trigger.
Enumeration.Description: TriggerInhibit specifies the activation of the trigger.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerActivation
Enumeration.ToolTip: TriggerActivation specifies the activation mode of the trigger.
Enumeration.Description: TriggerActivation specifies the activation mode of the trigger.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerShift
Enumeration.ToolTip: TriggerShift activates trigger signal shift and avoids noise caused by the trigger signal.
Enumeration.Description: TriggerShift activates trigger signal shift and avoids noise caused by the trigger signal.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerControl
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature controls exposure delay and exposure time behavior when ExposureMode is TriggerWidth.
Enumeration.Description: This feature controls exposure delay and exposure time behavior when ExposureMode is TriggerWidth.

Float.Name: TriggerDelay
Float.ToolTip: TriggerDelay specifies the delay (in us) to apply after the trigger reception before effectively activating it.
Float.Description: TriggerDelay specifies the delay (in us) to apply after the trigger reception before effectively activating it.

Integer.Name: TriggerCounter
Integer.ToolTip: Gets the count of trigger.
Integer.Description: Gets the count of trigger.

Command.Name: TriggerCounterReset
Command.ToolTip: This feature resets the trigger counter.
Command.Description: This feature resets the trigger counter.

IntReg.Name: TriggerCounterResetReg
IntReg.Description: This feature resets the trigger counter.

Boolean.Name: TriggerAcceptanceRangeEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: This feature controls if the trigger acceptance range is enabled.
Boolean.Description: This feature controls if the trigger acceptance range is enabled.

Integer.Name: TriggerAcceptanceRangeUpperLimit
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the upper limit of trigger acceptance range.
Integer.Description: Sets the upper limit of trigger acceptance range.

Integer.Name: TriggerAcceptanceRangeLowerLimit
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the lower limit of trigger acceptance range.
Integer.Description: Sets the lower limit of trigger acceptance range.

Command.Name: TriggerSoftware
Command.ToolTip: TriggerSoftware is a command that can be used by and application to generate an internal trigger when TriggerSource is set to Software.
Command.Description: TriggerSoftware is a command that can be used by and application to generate an internal trigger when TriggerSource is set to Software.

Enumeration.Name: SpecialTriggerMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature activates special trigger mode.
Enumeration.Description: This feature activates special trigger mode.

Integer.Name: NumberOfMemoryForSpecialTriggerMode
Integer.ToolTip: Number of memory channel for special trigger mode.
Integer.Description: Number of memory channel for special trigger mode.

IntReg.Name: NumberOfMemoryForSpecialTriggerModeReg
IntReg.ToolTip: Number of memory for special trigger mode

Enumeration.Name: SpecialTriggerSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: SpecialTriggerSource specifies the internal signal or physical input Line to use as the special trigger source for the selected special trigger when SpecialTriggerMode is On.
Enumeration.Description: SpecialTriggerSource specifies the internal signal or physical input Line to use as the special trigger source for the selected special trigger when SpecialTriggerMode is On.

Enumeration.Name: SpecialTriggerActivation
Enumeration.ToolTip: SpecialTriggerActivation specifies the activation mode of the special trigger.
Enumeration.Description: SpecialTriggerActivation specifies the activation mode of the special trigger.

Enumeration.Description: Selects the feature User Set as default User Set.

Enumeration.Description: Selects the feature User Set to load, save or configure.

Integer.Description: Provides the number of bytes transferred for each image or chunk on the stream channel. This includes any end-of-line, end-of-frame statistics or other stamp data. This is the total size of data payload for a data block.

Integer.Name: GevHeartbeatTimeout
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the current heartbeat timeout in milliseconds.
Integer.Description: Controls the current heartbeat timeout in milliseconds.

Integer.Name: GevTimestampTickFrequency
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the number of timestamp ticks in 1 second (frequency in Hz).
Integer.Description: Indicates the number of timestamp ticks in 1 second (frequency in Hz). If IEEE 1588 is used, this feature must return 1,000,000,000 (1 GHz).

Command.Name: GevTimestampControlLatch
Command.ToolTip: Latches the current timestamp counter into GevTimestampValue.
Command.Description: Latches the current timestamp counter into GevTimestampValue.

Command.Name: GevTimestampControlReset
Command.Description: Resets the timestamp counter to 0. This feature is not available or as no effect when IEEE 1588 is used.

Integer.Name: GevTimestampValue
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the latched 64-bit value of the timestamp counter.
Integer.Description: Returns the latched 64-bit value of the timestamp counter.

Boolean.Name: GevIEEE1588

Boolean.Description: Enables the IEEE 1588 Precision Time Protocol to control the timestamp register.

Integer.Description: Index of the logical link to use.

Integer.Name: GevSCPHostPort
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the port of the selected channel to which a GVSP transmitter must send data stream or the port from which a GVSP receiver may receive data stream.
Integer.Description: Controls the port of the selected channel to which a GVSP transmitter must send data stream or the port from which a GVSP receiver may receive data stream. Setting this value to 0 closes the stream channel.

Boolean.Name: GevSCPSFireTestPacket
Boolean.ToolTip: Sends a test packet.
Boolean.Description: Sends a test packet. When this feature is set, the device will fire one test packet.

Boolean.Name: GevSCPSDoNotFragment
Boolean.ToolTip: The state of this feature is copied into the "do not fragment" bit of IP header of each stream packet.
Boolean.Description: The state of this feature is copied into the "do not fragment" bit of IP header of each stream packet. It can be used by the application to prevent IP fragmentation of packets on the stream channel.

Boolean.Name: GevSCPSBigEndian
Boolean.ToolTip: Endianess of multi-byte pixel data for this stream.
Boolean.Description: Endianess of multi-byte pixel data for this stream.

Integer.Name: GevSCPSPacketSize
Integer.ToolTip: Specifies the stream packet size, in bytes, to send on the selected channel for a GVSP transmitter or specifies the maximum packet size supported by a GVSP receiver.
Integer.Description: Specifies the stream packet size, in bytes, to send on the selected channel for a GVSP transmitter or specifies the maximum packet size supported by a GVSP receiver.

Integer.Name: GevSCPD
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the delay (in timestamp counter unit) to insert between each packet for this stream channel.
Integer.Description: Controls the delay (in timestamp counter unit) to insert between each packet for this stream channel. This can be used as a crude flow-control mechanism if the application or the network infrastructure cannot keep up with the packets coming from the device.

Integer.Name: GevSCDA
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the destination IP address of the selected stream channel to which a GVSP transmitter must send data stream or the destination IP address from which a GVSP receiver may receive data stream.
Integer.Description: Controls the destination IP address of the selected stream channel to which a GVSP transmitter must send data stream or the destination IP address from which a GVSP receiver may receive data stream.

Integer.Name: GevSCSP
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the source port of the stream channel.
Integer.Description: Indicates the source port of the stream channel.

Boolean.Name: GevSCCFGPacketResendDestination
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables the alternate IP destination for stream packets resent due to a packet resend request.
Boolean.Description: Enables the alternate IP destination for stream packets resent due to a packet resend request. When True, the source IP address provided in the packet resend command packet is used. When False, the value set in the GevSCDA[GevStreamChannelSelector] feature is used.

Boolean.Name: GevSCCFGAllInTransmission
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables the selected GVSP transmitter to use the single packet per data block All-in Transmission mode.
Boolean.Description: Enables the selected GVSP transmitter to use the single packet per data block All-in Transmission mode.

Boolean.Name: GevSCCFGUnconditionalStreaming
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables the camera to continue to stream, for this stream channel, if its control channel is closed or regardless of the reception of any ICMP messages (such as destination unreachable messages).
Boolean.Description: Enables the camera to continue to stream, for this stream channel, if its control channel is closed or regardless of the reception of any ICMP messages (such as destination unreachable messages).

Boolean.Name: GevSCCFGExtendedChunkData
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables cameras to use the extended chunk data payload type for this stream channel.
Boolean.Description: Enables cameras to use the extended chunk data payload type for this stream channel.

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_HeartbeatTimeout
MaskedIntReg.Description: Controls the current heartbeat timeout in milliseconds.

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_TimestampTickFrequencyHigh
MaskedIntReg.Description: Indicates the number of timestamp ticks in 1 second (frequency in Hz).

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_TimestampTickFrequencyLow
MaskedIntReg.Description: Indicates the number of timestamp ticks in 1 second (frequency in Hz).

IntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_TimestampControl
IntReg.Description: Timestamp control register.

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_TimestampValuHigh
MaskedIntReg.Description: Returns the latched 64-bit value of the timestamp counter.

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_TimestampValuLow
MaskedIntReg.Description: Returns the latched 64-bit value of the timestamp counter.

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_IEEE1588
MaskedIntReg.Description: Enables the IEEE 1588 Precision Time Protocol to control the timestamp register.

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_GVCPExtendedStatusCodeVersion1_1
MaskedIntReg.Description: Enables the generation of extended status codes.

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_GVCPExtendedStatusCodeVersion2_0
MaskedIntReg.Description: Enables the generation of extended status codes.

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_GVCPPendingAck
MaskedIntReg.Description: Enables the generation of PENDING_ACK.

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_GVCPHeartbeatDisable
MaskedIntReg.Description: Disables the GVCP heartbeat.

IntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_GVCPPendingTimeout
IntReg.Description: Indicates the longest GVCP command execution time before a device returns a PENDING_ACK.

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_GVSPExtendedIDMode
MaskedIntReg.Description: Enables the extended IDs mode.

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_CurrentPhysicalLinkConfiguration
MaskedIntReg.Description: Indicates the current physical link configuration of the device.

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_PhysicalLinkConfiguration
MaskedIntReg.Description: Indicates the physical link configuration of the device.

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_CCP
MaskedIntReg.Description: Controls the device access privilege of an application.

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_PrimaryApplicationSocket
MaskedIntReg.Description: Returns the UDP source port of the primary application.

IntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_PrimaryApplicationIPAddress
IntReg.Description: Returns the address of the primary application.

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_MCPHostPort
MaskedIntReg.Description: Controls the port to which the device must send messages. Setting this value to 0 closes the message channel.

IntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_MCDA
IntReg.Description: Controls the destination IP address for the message channel.

IntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_MCTT
IntReg.Description: Provides the transmission timeout value in milliseconds.

IntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_MCRC
IntReg.Description: Controls the number of retransmissions allowed when a message channel message times out.

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_MCSP
MaskedIntReg.Description: This feature indicates the source port for the message channel.

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_SCPDirection
MaskedIntReg.Description: Reports the direction of the stream channel.

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_SCPInterfaceIndex
MaskedIntReg.Description: Index of the logical link to use.

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_SCPHostPort
MaskedIntReg.Description: Controls the port of the selected channel to which a GVSP transmitter must send data stream or the port from which a GVSP receiver may receive data stream. Setting this value to 0 closes the stream channel.

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_SCPSFireTestPacket
MaskedIntReg.Description: Sends a test packet. When this feature is set, the device will fire one test packet.

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_SCPSDoNotFragment
MaskedIntReg.Description: The state of this feature is copied into the "do not fragment" bit of IP header of each stream packet. It can be used by the application to prevent IP fragmentation of packets on the stream channel.

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_SCPSBigEndian
MaskedIntReg.Description: Endianess of multi-byte pixel data for this stream.

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_SCPSPacketSize
MaskedIntReg.Description: Specifies the stream packet size, in bytes, to send on the selected channel for a GVSP transmitter or specifies the maximum packet size supported by a GVSP receiver.

IntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_SCPD
IntReg.Description: Controls the delay (in timestamp counter unit) to insert between each packet for this stream channel. This can be used as a crude flow-control mechanism if the application or the network infrastructure cannot keep up with the packets coming from the device.

IntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_SCDA
IntReg.Description: Indicates the source port of the stream channel.

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_SCSP
MaskedIntReg.Description: Indicates the source port of the stream channel.

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_StreamChannel0BigAndLittleEndian
MaskedIntReg.Description: Stream Channel 0 Big And Little Endian

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_StreamChannel0IPReassembly
MaskedIntReg.Description: Stream Channel 0 IP Reassembly

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_StreamChannel0MultiZonen
MaskedIntReg.Description: Stream Channel 0 Multi Zonen

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_StreamChannel0PacketResendDestination
MaskedIntReg.Description: Stream Channel 0 Packet Resend Destination

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_StreamChannel0AllInTransmission
MaskedIntReg.Description: Stream Channel 0 All In Transmission

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_StreamChannel0UnconditionalStreaming
MaskedIntReg.Description: Stream Channel 0 Unconditional Streaming

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_StreamChannel0ExtendedChunkData
MaskedIntReg.Description: Stream Channel 0 Extended Chunk Data

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_SCCFGPacketResendDestination
MaskedIntReg.Description: Enables the alternate IP destination for stream packets resent due to a packet resend request. When True, the source IP address provided in the packet resend command packet is used. When False, the value set in the GevSCDA[GevStreamChannelSelector] feature is used.

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_SCCFGAllInTransmission
MaskedIntReg.Description: Enables the selected GVSP transmitter to use the single packet per data block All-in Transmission mode.

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_SCCFGUnconditionalStreaming
MaskedIntReg.Description: Enables the camera to continue to stream, for this stream channel, if its control channel is closed or regardless of the reception of any ICMP messages (such as destination unreachable messages).

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_SCCFGExtendedChunkData
MaskedIntReg.Description: Enables cameras to use the extended chunk data payload type for this stream channel.

IntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_ActionDeviceKey
IntReg.Description: Provides the device key that allows the device to check the validity of action commands.

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_ActionUnconditionalMode
MaskedIntReg.Description: Enables the unconditional action command mode where action commands are processed even when the primary control channel is closed.

IntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_ActionGroupKey
IntReg.Description: Provides the key that the device will use to validate the action on reception of the action protocol message.

IntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_ActionGroupMask
IntReg.Description: Provides the mask that the device will use to validate the action on reception of the action protocol message.

IntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_NumberOfActionSignals
IntReg.Description: Indicates the stream channel source port is supported.

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_SCSPxSupported
MaskedIntReg.Description: Indicates the stream channel source port is supported.

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_Legacy16bitBlockIDSupported
MaskedIntReg.Description: Indicates the Legacy 16bit Block ID is supported.

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_MCSPxSupported
MaskedIntReg.Description: Indicates the message channel source port is supported.

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_PhysicalLinkConfigurationCap
MaskedIntReg.Description: Indicates the supported physical link configuration of the device.

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_PayloadType
MaskedIntReg.Description: Configuration of the payload type of the device.

IntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_ResendWaitFinal
IntReg.Description: Configuration of the waiting time from final frame.

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_ResendFrame
MaskedIntReg.Description: Indicate the number of the resend count.

MaskedIntReg.Name: GEV_BOOTSTRAP_PayloadRawSize
MaskedIntReg.Description: Configuration of the payload raw size.
